overview: Riri (Mitha The Virgin) is an announcer who reads mystery stories on the radio and Wanda (Dara The Virgin) is a fan of Ririâ€™s show. Wanda likes to write a mystery story but does not have the guts to send it to the radio. Wanda was paralyzed after a car accident that killed his brother, Tino. Once Riri is found by her mother hanging herself in her room. Since the death of Riri, Wanda often gets harassments at her home.Wanda is frightened and decides to investigate the case.
title: The Promise
